name: Simply Scalloped Cowl/Neckwarmer
description:
This snuggly cowl is made from 100% soft acrylic materials. It's about ten inches wide and 8.5 inches tall. Can be folded or worn straight up to cover the entire neck. It's warm and cozy. Looks great with any jacket or coat, jeans or suit.


Washing Instructions: Machine was warm water, gentle cycle, machine dry low heat, delicate cycle.

Payment is due within 3 days.  Please allow 72 hours from time payment is received to make and ship your order. FREE SHIPPING ON THIS ITEM TO THE US AND CANADA!

Thanks for looking!

name: Curly Scarf
description:
his hand crocheted curly scarf is made from 100% super soft acrylic (it gets softer with each washing too). It's off white and ruffly. Would make a great addition to any outfit, and is fun and playful. It's approximately 52.5" long and 2" wide.

Washing Instructions: Machine was warm water, gentle cycle, machine dry low heat, delicate cycle.

Payment is due within 3 days of placing order.  Please allow 72 hours from when payment is sent for scarf to be made and shipped out.

Thanks for looking!

name: Ruffled Buttoned Scarflette
description:
This super soft, luxurious  scarflette is made lovingly especially for you! It features a tight stitch to keep your neck extra warm (and the cold air out) and has buttons so you don't have to worry about any embarrassing scarf tails hanging out the bottom of your fab winter coat. It's ruffled on the top and bottom for a little bit of girly flair to stick out of the top of your coat. :)

Scarflette measures approx 13.5" x 5.5".

Payment is due within 3 days.  Please allow 72 hours after payment is received for your scarflette to be made and shipped.

name: Light Weight Scarf
description:
This hand crocheted lightweight scarf is made from 100% super soft acrylic (it gets softer with each washing too). It's got a little bit of a sheen to it (pictures just don't do it justice). Would make a great addition to any outfit, and is fun and playful. It's approximately 42" long and 3" wide.

Washing Instructions: Machine was warm water, gentle cycle, machine dry low heat, delicate cycle.

Payment is due within 3 days.  Please allow 72 hours from when payment is received for your scarf to be made and shipped.
